lead_paragraph: The Wayne County executive, Warren C. Evans, is asking the state to declare a financial emergency to help shore up the struggling fiscal picture for the county, the state’s most populous.

headline.main: Michigan: Largest County Seeks Emergency Status
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Largest County Seeks Emergency Status

snippet: The Wayne County executive, Warren C. Evans, is asking the state to declare a financial emergency to help shore up the struggling fiscal picture for the county, the state’s most populous.
